sentence.Network_en: Antarctic air brought biting cold to southern Chile on Thursday.
sentence.Network_cn: 周四，南极气流给智利南部带来了刺骨的严寒。

sentence.Network_en: The snow cruiser proved hopelessly unsuited to Antarctic conditions.
sentence.Network_cn: 事实证明雪地车根本不适合在南极地区使用。

sentence.Network_en: Because of the extreme cold, the Antarctic is a uniquely fragile environment.
sentence.Network_cn: 极度严寒造成了南极地区绝无仅有的脆弱环境。

entry.def: The Antarctic is the area around the South Pole.

auth_sentence.content: That is why the antarctic can easily be called a desert.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: That is why the antarctic can easily be called a desert.

auth_sentence.content: Several dozen ships now cruise to the Antarctic Peninsula each year.
auth_sentence.res_content: Several dozen ships now cruise to the Antarctic Peninsula each year.

Sentence.sentence: The whole Antarctic region will be submerged.
How unstable the West Antarctic ice sheet is
The West Antarctic region was once an open ocean.

sentences.cn: 对南极研究有兴趣的科学家

sentences.en: The Antarctic species have few special adaptations for polar life.
sentences.cn: 南极的物种对极地生活几乎没有什么特别的适应性改变。

sentences.en: In the Antarctic, the temperature rarely rises above freezing point.
sentences.cn: 在南极，温度很少升到零度以上。

sentences.en: The Antarctic is a mountainous area.
sentences.cn: 南极洲是一个多山的地区。
